gallery_1.title: Grilled Angus Ribeye
gallery_1.description: Tender and juicy Angus ribeye, grilled to perfection and served with garlic mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables. Indulge in the rich flavor of prime beef, complemented by our house-made steak sauce.

gallery_2.title: Seafood Linguine
gallery_2.description: A seafood lover's delight! Our linguine pasta is tossed with a medley of shrimp, scallops, and clams in a savory garlic white wine sauce. Finished with fresh herbs and Parmesan cheese, it's a taste of the sea in every bite.

gallery_3.title: Vegetarian Stuffed Bell Pepper
gallery_3.description: A vibrant and flavorful dish featuring roasted bell peppers stuffed with quinoa, black beans, corn, and spices. Topped with melted cheese and served with cilantro lime rice, it's a satisfying option for vegetarians and meat-lovers alike.

gallery_4.title: Pan-Seared Salmon
gallery_4.description: Savor the delicate flavors of our pan-seared salmon, served with a tangy lemon dill sauce. Accompanied by roasted asparagus and wild rice pilaf, this dish is a light and refreshing choice for seafood enthusiasts.

gallery_5.title: Classic Beef Burger
gallery_5.description: Sink your teeth into our classic beef burger, made with a juicy beef patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles on a toasted brioche bun. Served with crispy fries on the side, it's the ultimate comfort food indulgence.

gallery_6.title: Decadent Chocolate Lava Cake
gallery_6.description: Save room for dessert and indulge in our decadent chocolate lava cake. Warm and gooey on the inside, with a crispy exterior, this indulgent treat is served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream, creating the perfect sweet ending to your meal.

gallery_7.title: Decadent Chocolate Lava Cake
gallery_7.description: Save room for dessert and indulge in our decadent chocolate lava cake. Warm and gooey on the inside, with a crispy exterior, this indulgent treat is served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream, creating the perfect sweet ending to your meal.
